name: Exterminate (Dryginmartini)
description:
‘Have you ever imagined what you're gonna do in the last five minutes before the world ends?’

In this game, u will need to gather information in the scene and figure out the current situation.

The major topic that my project level built on is ‘a fetching environmental narrative’ based on the optional sub-theme our tutor provided. To incarnate both the major sub-theme and appropriate level design and thoughtful narrative storytelling perfectly, each operation has been taken derived from theoretical, conceptual and philosophical research( unincluded in ‘weekly reading section, based on narrative needs) and personal aesthetic. The game is totally built up and powered by Unity 2020 High Definition Render Pipeline, used Megascan Quixel plug-in for texturing and creating functional HDRP material, models resources are totally come from sketchfab with at least personal used license (some of them are commercial allowed), with background music created by myself from Garageband. 

The game was designed to deeply understand level design knowledge and thoughtfully create level innovation for academic propose.

Reference and Citation will be shown in the documents within game package.

Big appreciation to Unity engine and designers who provided those stunning models and assets, that I can have a chance to create such amazing high-resolution playable level.

All the models, the software I used, background music, VFX resources, 3d assets are at least personally used allowed. 

Some of the models, the software I used, background music, VFX resources, 3d assets are commercial allowed.  check for more details in the game package.
